title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart's title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart's title even if the key is blank in the properties file.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank.
3. Add the chart to the application and check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart's title.
